Posts.Content: Aug 30, 2013 07:12PM jocur5 wrote: I found a rather large lump about a week or so ago, I have a scan booked for the 10th September. I am really worried only my husband knows so far as I dont know who to talk to. It could be nothing and I have worried them but I feel like crying and feeling sorry for myself.
Posts.Title: Worried about a lump... EmmorsMom jocur5
